%can break%.description: True if a player can break the block

%faction land%.description: Gets faction land player is in

%is bleeding%.description: True if the player is bleeding via McMMO

%is blocking%.description: True if the player is blocking

%is flying%.description: True if the player is flying

%is sneaking%.description: True if the player is sneaking

%level of skill <skill>%.description: Level of a player's McMMO skill

%block below%.description: Block type player/mob is standing on

%has enchantment in hand of <enchant>%.description: Whether player/mob has an enchantment on the item in its main hand

%has enchantment in hand of <enchant> le.description: Whether player/mob has an enchantment of a specific level on the item in its main hand

%has enchantment in <armor slot> of <enc.description: Whether player/mob has an enchantment on the item in a specific armor slot

%has potion effect <effect>%.description: Whether player/mob has a potion effect

%item in hand level <enhantment>%.description: Level of enchantment on item in main hand

%is critical%.description: Whether attack was a critical hit

%is holding%.description: Type of item currently held by player/mob

%is damageable%.description: Whether the player/mob can be damaged

%is removal%.description: Whether effect is removal (EFFECT_STATIC, HELD, SHIFT, SPRINT)

%item slot%.description: Slot of item that triggered enchant

%nearby mobs%.description: Amount of mobs in a 10 block radius

%offhand item%.description: Type of item currently held in offhand by player/mob

%players%.description: Amount of players in a 10 block radius

%potion effect level <effect> <level>%.description: Whether player/mob has a potion effect of a specific level

%x double%.description: More precise X coordinate of player/mob

%y double%.description: More precise Y coordinate of player/mob

%z double%.description: More precise Z coordinate of player/mob

%block tags%.description: Array of tags a target block has

%is riding%.description: Whether player/mob is riding player/mob (or is a passenger)

%is headshot%.description: Whether an arrow/trident hit was a headshot

%force%.description: Force of bow when firing arrow

%damaged from behind%.description: If victim was damaged from behind by enemy

%block type lowercase%.description: Type of block but all letters are lowercase

%block drop type%.description: Type of item block will drop

%is crop%.description: Whether broken block was a crop

%is fully grown%.description: Whether broken crop was fully grown

%block location%.description: Location of the block (used in location parameter)
